name: (by no means is this an actual) Flight Simulator
name_original: (by no means is this an actual) Flight Simulator
description:
This is a game made in Twine describing a dream that will only come true if you make it.

Life comes at you at jet speed. You can exist one day, and be a dream the next. And with such short time on earth, it's...probably better not to die in your hometown.
